unidue.ub.statistics.alephConnector

Class DocumentGetter

  • java.lang.Object
    • unidue.ub.statistics.alephConnector.DocumentGetter

  • public class DocumentGetter
extends java.lang.Object
    Retrieves the documents from the Aleph database.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Frank Lützenkirchen, Eike Spielberg

      uses a given connection to Aleph database to build an instance of the DocumentGetter-object

                                                            java.lang.Boolean exact)
                                                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        retrieves the documents connected to a shelfmark
        Parameters:
        shelfmark - the shelfmark of the documents retrieved from the Aleph database
        exact - boolean indicating whether other editions are to be retrieved as well
        Returns:
        documents set of documents
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - exception querying the Aleph database
